# Howard Hall (actor)

in the 1920 play A Man of the People]]
Howard Hall (born Charles Sumner; 30 May 1867 â€“ 25 July 1921) was an American actor and writer, best known for Kidnapped in New York and  Alias Mrs. Jessop.
Hall was born in 1867 in Michigan. He died on 1921 in Long Beach, California.
